name: Brevard Zoo
desc: Family-friendly zoo with animal encounters, train rides, splash pad, and Treetop Trek aerial adventures.

name: Exploration Tower
desc: Interactive exhibits, observation decks, and kids activities at Port Canaveral.

name: Cocoa Beach Pier
desc: Historic pier with shops, restaurants, fishing, and beach access. Family fun and ocean views.

name: Andretti Thrill Park
desc: Go-karts, mini-golf, arcade, batting cages, and rides for kids of all ages.

name: Wickham Park
desc: Large park with playgrounds, walking trails, disc golf, and a dog park.

name: Manatee Sanctuary Park
desc: Riverfront park with playground, walking paths, and frequent manatee sightings.

name: Ritch Grissom Memorial Wetlands
desc: Scenic wetlands with wildlife viewing, birdwatching, and walking trails.

name: Space View Park
desc: Riverfront park with NASA and space exploration monuments. Good for launches and kids to explore.

name: Sand Point Park
desc: Large community park with playgrounds, splash pad, and picnic areas in Titusville.

name: Playalinda Beach
desc: Natural, unspoiled beach with clean sand and great wildlife viewing. Family-friendly (note: some remote areas clothing-optional, but main entrances are family oriented).

name: Lori Wilson Park
desc: Oceanfront park with playground, nature trail, picnic pavilions, and beach access.

name: Gleason Park
desc: Shaded park with playground, walking path around a lake, and a public pool (fee).

name: The Children's Hunger Project Kid's Space Park
desc: Unique space-themed playground in Cocoa for kids of all ages.

name: Eastern Florida State College Planetarium & Observatory
desc: Public astronomy shows and hands-on science activities for children (check for current hours/operations).

name: American Police Hall of Fame & Museum
desc: Interactive exhibits, police vehicles, and kids' play area.

name: Viera Regional Park
desc: Large park with multiple playgrounds, athletic fields, and walking paths.

name: McLarty Park
desc: Community park with playground, pool, tennis, and basketball courts in Rockledge.

name: Jungle Adventures
desc: See alligators, wildlife shows, and animal encounters. Fun for kids.

name: Samuel C. Phillips Park
desc: Neighborhood park with a modern playground and sports fields.

name: Pumpkin Patch Playground at Rotary Park
desc: Themed, fenced playground for children in Suntree.
